net.livebookstore.mail
Class MailListener

java.lang.Object
  net.livebookstore.mail.MailListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.jms.MessageListener
public class MailListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.jms.MessageListener

Message listener to handle mail ObjectMesage. When ObjectMessage is arrived, this class will send mail using pre-defined MailSender object.

Author:
Xuefeng
